name: ensemble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a group of things or people acting or taken together as a whole, especially a group of musicians who regularly play together: The Mozart Ensemble is/are playing at Carnegie Hall tonight.whole ensemble She bought a dress and matching hat, gloves, and shoes - in fact the whole ensemble.

Groups and collections of things
Add to word list
Add to word list
a group of people who perform music together, or a collection of things intended to be used together: a woodwind ensemble I admired her ensemble of coat, hat, and shoes.
